docs.title: Basic Sgaw Karen 02 - Pronouns and Possessives
Basic Sgaw Karen 04 - Days of the week
Video Comprehension: Matching Quiz Thats right! Here is a summary of the video:
docs.text: Check Answers  There are two main ways to say days of the week in Sgaw Karen, the first being the more proper but less practical and less used way:  English Sgaw Karen Sunday မုၢ်ဒဲး Monday မုၢ်ဆၣ် Tuesday မုၢ်ယူာ် Wednesday မုၢ်ပျဲၤ Thursday မုၢ်လ့ဧိၤ Friday မုၢ်ဖီဖး Saturday မုၢ်ဘူၣ်   Then, the more practical and common way:  English Sgaw Karen Sunday မုၢ်နွံနံၤ / မုၢ်အိၣ်ဘှံးနံၤ Monday မုၢ်တနံၤ Tuesday မုၢ်ခံနံၤ Wednesday မုၢ်သၢနံၤ Thursday မုၢ်လွံၢ်နံၤ Friday မုၢ်ယဲၢ်နံၤ Saturday မုၢ်ဃုနံၤ    Additional vocabulary + relative time:  English Sgaw Karen Day မုၢ်နံၤ / နံၤ Yesterday မဟါတနံၤ / မဟါကၢာ် Today တနံၤအံၤ Tomorrow ခဲမုၢ်ဆ့ၣ် The day after tomorrow ခဲတဆ့ၣ်
